QuestData.Title: The Vile Blood of Demons
QuestData.Description: Thalipedes wants demon blood. Personally, the stuff doesn't even seem like blood to me - more like liquid rot - but that's neither here nor there.$b$bLuckily for you, the area around the Dark Portal is crawling with demons. Infernals, felhounds, felguards... they've all got what you need, in copious, pustulent amounts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 7 bottles of Vile Demonic Blood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ugh, what's that smell? Is that you, or the blood?
QuestData.RewardText: There's no doubt about it, you found demon blood.$b$bLoramus' requests aside, I'm sure Dar'toon is thankful for your efforts. They've been struggling to deal with these demon distractions for some time now.
